content: ऊरुः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}) [ऊर्णु-कर्मणि कु नुलोपश्च <ls>Uṇ. 1. 30</ls>] The thigh; ऊरू तदस्य यद्वैश्यः <ls>Rv. 10. 90. 12</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 31</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 1.">87</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 88</ls>; (at the end of {%<ab>fem.</ab>%} compounds the form is °रुः or °रूः, but more usually the latter; रंभोरूः, वामोरूः, करभोरु Voc).
